entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near noon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 19.
